name: uniform
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a particular set of clothes that has to be worn by the members of the same organization or group of people

example.eg: I love a man in uniform!

trans_examp.trans_en: a type of clothes that is connected with a particular group of people
trans_examp.trans_cn: （某一群体的人穿的）典型服装，特有服装

example.eg: Photographs show him wearing the T-shirt and ripped jeans that were the student's uniform of the time.
example.egtrans: 照片上的他穿着T恤衫和破洞牛仔裤，一幅当时学生的典型打扮。

name: uniform
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: the same; not changing or different in any way
trans_examp.trans_cn: 相同的；一律的；整齐划一的

example.eg: The office walls and furniture are a uniform grey.
example.egtrans: 办公室的墙壁和家具一律都是灰色的。

example.eg: Small businesses are demanding that they receive uniform treatment from the banks.
example.egtrans: 小企业要求银行给予它们一视同仁的待遇。
